content.question: Capture and paste a program code segment that you developed that implements an algorithm used in your program. The algorithm must include sequencing, selection, and iteration.

frqParts.text: Capture and paste a program code segment that you developed that implements an algorithm used in your program. The algorithm must include sequencing, selection, and iteration.

Provide a written response that: (Approx. 100 words, exclusive of program code) explains in detailed steps how the selected algorithm works. Your explanation must be detailed enough for someone else to be able to recreate it.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
